title: Updates & Fixes :sparkle:
post: <b>What's New/Fixed</b><ul><li>You can no longer react multiple times with a single reaction on posts.<li>Fixed an issue where not all replies in posts were fetched.<li>Added an automatic saving feature for drafting posts. You can clear previous drafts by clicking the "delete" button.<li>Links to ImgBB are automatically removed from images.</ul>
